dcterms:description: A publicly available OCT dataset with images from patients with mild age-related macular degeneration (AMD) and normal subjects. Experts provided layer boundaries for the inner limiting membrane (ILM), retinal pigment epithelium drusen complex (RPEDC), and Bruchs membrane (BM). Pixel-wise annotations were generated by assigning classes to tissue layers in between boundaries.
dcterms:title: OCT dataset
